Nueva factura

Producto Precio Unitario Cantidad Imagen Total
{{producto.precio * producto.cantidad}}
Sub total {{calcularSubTotal()}}
Impuestos (19%) {{calcularImpuestos()}}
Total {{calcularTotal()}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-create-invoice', templateUrl: './create-invoice.component.html', styleUrls: ['./create-invoice.component.css'] }) export class CreateInvoiceComponent { products: Product[] = []; addProduct() { this.products.push({ productName: '', price: 0, quantity: 1, imageUrl: '' }); } } interface Product { productName: string; price: number; quantity: number; imageUrl: string; }
